description: amusement bank; insert coin (25 cents) to operate crane claw for a chance to pick up a prize and drop it down a delivery chute; red base and top; clear body with mirror at back; black accents at foot, waist and top; 4 AA batteries required; 2 controllers at lower right side operate crane
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

under base, raised: [Radio Shack (c) / Cat. No. 60-1228 (...)]; on front, raised: [CRANE BANK]
markings: on front, on sticker: [INSERT / COIN / 25 c]
title: "Crane Bank" mechanical bank
